title: Behind the skyscrapers
creator_credit: Frederick Niemann, White Ribbon and National Women's Christian Temperance Union
brief_description: Documentary of life on “Skid Row”, a section of a metropolitan city, where down and out people live in doorways and in condemned housing. Factual, unrehearsed scenes show us their lives.
creator_credit_for_label: Frederick Niemann, White Ribbon and National Women’s Christian Temperance Union
